title: Camera movement delay
body:
I can't tell if this is a computer thing, or if it's a bug or what.

When I either use my mouse to move the camera (by moving it to a corner of the screen), or use arrow keys to move my camera, there is a very noticeable delay in movement from when I either press the button, or move mouse, to when the camera actually moves.

This is defiantly not a lag thing, as the way the game is programmed, camera doesn't need internet to work.

Might be a FPS thing, but when I issue move commands my character moves and the animation is very smooth (no lost frames). Although there is a small delay in when he actually moves, I'll chalk that one up to ping, as I average 60 ms.

I haven't played in a couple weeks, but I definitely DON'T remember the camera being THIS unresponsive. I really wanted to play, but after fiddling around with the camera in a custom game for a bit find the game to be unplayable (there is even camera jitter if I play with camera locked on.)

any suggestions on how to fix would be great!

replies.body: The camera is still going over to an area of the map where data is being sent back and forth from your network to the game server.  This issue does sound like a connection issue, but you can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to really know for sure.  Let me know the results, and we'll go from there.

Thanks for responding, but I think restarting my computer was the fix. Thanks for trying though.

P.S. the log reader said my ping and packet loss were normal/fine.

Cheers
